dict.acceptation: 交易，业务，事务；办理，处理；（一笔）交易，（一项）事务；（学会等的）会议记录，学报；

sent.orig: According to transaction cost theory, outsourcing could simplify the organizations, and then reduce transaction costs.
sent.trans: 根据交易费用理论，外包可以使企业精简，进而减少内部交易费用。

sent.orig: Returns the underlying transaction object created by the transaction dispenser.
sent.trans: 返回由事务分配器创建的基本事务对象。

sent.orig: Propagation: normally all code executed within a transaction scope will run in that transaction.
sent.trans: 事务传播：通常在一个事务中执行的所有代码都会在这个事务中运行。

sent.orig: Unable to rollback transaction. No transaction is currently in progress.
sent.trans: 无法回滚事务。当前无正在进行的事务。

sent.orig: Tax that cannot be assessed in regular periods may be assessed on a transaction-by-transaction basis.
sent.trans: 不能按照固定期限纳税的，可以按次纳税。
